string.text: Ah, stalker, what do you need?
What do you need? I still have more data to collect. Let's go find some more mutants.
Well done, stalker, here is the payment I promised. Come see me again some time; as I might have more work for you.
What would you like to say to me?
You're in the wrong place, buddy! And you better leave before we make it the wrong time, too.
You looking for trouble or something? Get out of here before you find it!
Get lost, buddy. Do that, and we'll keep it peaceful.
